title: Every exit doorway shall open into an enclosed stairway or a horizontal exit, or a corridor or passa
clause_text: Every exit doorway shall open into an enclosed stairway or a horizontal exit, or a corridor or passageway providing continuous and protected means of egress:

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
